author.description: Kyle Flemmer | writer, publisher, digital media artist | http://objkt.com/profile/kflemmer

text: from "make it a habit each night" by Dani Spinosa and Gary Barwin (2023). The images come primarily from the "Adler J2/J4 Typewriter Manual" (1966). Their remix of the instruction manual format playfully intervenes in conventional notions of gendered labor, mechanization, and capitalism.
